modName: Bound Weapons - Last Longer and Cast Faster
summary: Makes bound weapons last for 2 hours instead of 2 minutes as well as reducing cast time, down from 0.5 seconds to 0.3.
descriptionHtml:
Makes bound weapons last for 2 hours instead of 2 minutes as well as reducing cast time, down from 0.5 seconds to 0.3. Also reduces the mana cost (Unintended side-affect, tried to change the mana cost to be static so that it wouldn't increase to a silly amount like 3000 when the spell duration was increased).

This was originally created for my own use, but I decided to upload it in case anyone else wanted it. I won't be adding different versions unless I use them.

Enjoy!
author: MrFacepalm

files.name: Bound Weapons Last Longer and Cast Faster
